extendedInfo.description: FREE app. Blocks all incoming calls. Puts an auto-reply to all texts coming in. Texting & Driving Prevention Application from AutoInsuranceEZ.com is an Android app that you can download for free. While in use, the app silences text messages and incoming calls and sends the caller a text letting them know that youâre on the road. This app helps keep our roads safe by promoting the idea of no texting while driving. Texting while driving is a habit deadlier than drunk driving, and is a serious problem, especially among teenagers. A texting driver is 23 times more likely to get into an accident than a non-texting driver.  To stop this dangerous behavior, the AutoInsurance EZ.com team created a Texting and Driving Prevention app. The app features: Start Trip/End Trip - Once you turn it on, if you receive a text message or call, it will send a bounce back message to the sender. You can customize the message. Speed limit â The app blocks all incoming calls and messages when the GPS shows the phone moving over a certain speed. You can specify the speed limit in the settings.Texting and Driving Prevention application from AutoInsuranceEZ.com is the most effective app for parents worried about their teen drivers.Like our style? Then you'll love us on Facebook!http://www.facebook.com/AutoinsuranceEZAnd for free auto insurance quotes, visit http://www.autoinsuranceez.com/

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: I set the app to automatically turn on at 20mph and if never turned on. So, at the stop light, I turned it on manually and had my passenger try to text me. The text came through and no auto response was sent to her phone.
reviews.author: Ryan Whitmire

reviews.title: Did not work!
reviews.comment: Did not block my call on my phone or my boyfriends. Nor did it send a text. Uninstalling the app.
reviews.author: Jessica Wrath

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: App is worthless.  Text messages are still received.
reviews.author: Chris Breault

reviews.title: Does not send a message!
reviews.comment: This app only puts your phone on silent when driving. I it does not send a message to the person texting you. Uninstalling this app!
reviews.author: Stephen Pales

reviews.title: great...but
reviews.comment: Great app except need standard units
reviews.author: Duane Chamberlain II

reviews.title: Great App, Helps Keep Safe!
reviews.comment: Thus app helps keep me concentrated on the road instead of being bothered by alerts fom my phone like texts and calls. Great!
reviews.author: Jamie Capretta

reviews.title: Does not work on Pantech.
reviews.comment: This is exactly what I was looking for.  But,  I could not get it to work on my Pantech.    So sad.....
reviews.author: Mark Young
